backend/main.mo: Backend canister with access control, user profiles, and public/admin inquiry submission and retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking deployment-related feature to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, theming variables, and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA-friendly 404 page that redirects unknown routes to root for client-side routing.
frontend/public/admin/index.html: Admin entry page that redirects to the root while preserving admin intent for SPA routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that conditionally renders the admin interface or marketing site based on normalized path.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Prompts admins to log in via Internet Identity and handles login/logout flow with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryAct: Provides actions for inquiries including read toggling, deletion, and JSON/CSV export for bulk lists.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryLis: Fetches and displays inquiries with filtering, status counts, and per-item actions via InquiryActions.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Logo component displaying the Vaishnavi brand mark at variable sizes.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying business info, disclaimers, copyright, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Client inquiry form with validation, success messages, and integration with inquiry submission API.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Shows business address, operator details, and contact buttons for phone and WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Section containing the inquiry form wrapped inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, business intro text, and quick-call/WhatsApp buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Displays categorized service cards sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Shows reasons to choose the business as cards populated from siteContent.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines localized business info, hero text, service categories, and footer content for the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching user profiles, admin status, inquiries, and performing inquiry mutations via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook for submitting inquiries and invalidating related admin data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders admin UI with authentication checks, admin validation, and appropriate loading or error states.
frontend/src/utils/inquiryExport.ts: Exports inquiries to JSON or CSV by generating downloadable files in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and optionally removing them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the websiteâ€™s purpose, features, requirements, issues, and architectural notes.
